name.description: Human readable string for test case or suite name. Keeping this unique would be problematic and prone to changing so this is an optional field

result.description: This is an ‘interpreted’ result, and the choices are designed to match what resultsDB expects.PASSED, FAILED, INFO, NEEDS_INSPECTION

raw.description: This is a raw result, such as a ‘1 liner’ from a perf test. This field should be limited in length, say 500 chars or less. If you need more (see raw_url field)

raw_url.description: If the raw result is too large to be sent via a bus message, provide a URL to the result information so that it can be parsed

xunit_files.description: Relative path from the run URL (above) to the xunit XML files (includes the full file name for this xunit file)
